features: MAXIMUM STRENGTH MUCINEX SINUS-MAX DAY: Helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, headache, nasal and chest congestion and thins and loosens mucus
MAXIMUM STRENGTH MUCINEX SINUS-MAX NIGHT: Helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, nasal congestion, cough, and runny nose and sneezing
TRUSTED COLD and COUGH BRAND: Cold and Cough brand doctors trust
ACTIVE INGREDIENTS IN DAY: Contains Acetaminophen for pain relief, Dextromethorphan HBr for cough suppression, Guaifenesin as an expectorant and Phenylephrine HCl for nasal decongestion
ACTIVE INGREDIENTS IN NIGHT: Contains Acetaminophen for pain relief, Dextromethorphan HBr for cough suppression, Doxylamine Succinate as an Antihistamine and Phenylephrine HCl for nasal decongestion
USAGE: Use as directed; For ages 12 plus years
body.description: Maximum Strength Mucinex Sinus-Max Day and Night is an OTC medicine for relief of your Multi-symptom Sinus Relief. Maximum Strength Mucinex Sinus- Max Day helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, headache, cough, congestion, thins & loosens mucus and chest congestion. Maximum Strength Mucinex Sinus- Max Night helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, nasal congestion, cough, and runny nose & sneezing. Mucinex is the #1 Cold and Cough brand doctors trust*. This product contains 24 Fast Dissolving Liquid Gels (16 Day + 8 Night). It can be used by Adults and Children 12 years of age and over. SINUS SYMPTOMS RELIEVED DAY SYMPTOMS RELIEVED: Maximum Strength Mucinex Sinus-Max Day helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, headache, cough, congestion, thins & loosens mucus and chest congestion NIGHT SYMPTOMS RELIEVED: Maximum Strength Mucinex Sinus-Max Night helps relieve pain, sinus pressure, nasal congestion, cough, and runny nose & sneezing KEY INGREDIENTS MUCINEX SINUS-MAX DAY ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Contains Acetaminophen for pain relief, Dextromethorphan HBr for cough suppression, Guaifenesin as an expectorant and Phenylephrine HCl for nasal decongestion MUCINEX SINUS-MAX NIGHT ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Contains Acetaminophen for pain relief, Dextromethorphan HBr for cough suppression, Doxylamine Succinate as an Antihistamine and Phenylephrine HCl for nasal decongestion Do not take the Mucinex Sinus-Max Day and Night liquid gels at the same time. Always wait at least 4 hours before taking another dose of Mucinex liquid gels. Take only as directed. *IQVIA using ProVoice Survey, December 2022

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mucus is important to your health, from moisturizing your body to protecting it from harmful pathogens. But things like allergies or cold viruses can thicken it, making it interfere with your breathing and well-being. Dull, throbbing pain located at the front of your face. The pain may get worse when you lean over or bend down, when you touch your face (especially your cheeks or forehead) and might also feel more severe in chilly, damp weather. If your sinus headache comes from a cold or flu, you’ll have other symptoms, too. If you have a sinus pressure and nasal congestion, you might develop a sore throat and experience dry (nonproductive) coughing, or develop a wet productive chest cough. This is due to the mucus running down the back of your nose to your throat, where it can cause additional irritation. If sinus pressure and nasal congestion are caused by an infection, arise in temperature may soon join the mix of symptoms. A sinus infection can trigger some whole-body symptoms as your immune system fights to keep the infection at bay—which may cause fatigue or a fever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, but exactly the same active ingredients as Fast-Max
reviews.reviewText: I really hate it when companies feel they need to use different labels for the same product in order to target different potential markets. In this case it worked in my favor though. This Sinus Max has the EXACT SAME ACTIVE INGREDIENTS as the Fast Max product both by Mucinex. So why am I happy? Well this box cost me only $13.04 while the Fast Max would have cost me $15.24 for the exact same thing.Still, I'm a little disappointed that they couldn't figure out a way to name the product in a way that communicated it did cold and flu and sinus all at once, instead of trying to dupe us. Whatever, the meds work so I'll let it slide...this time.So the Day use pills don't make you tired, do relieve stuffiness, sinus headaches, and have an expectorant(which I expect from something with the name Mucinex) the night time pills, will help you sleep, get rid of sinus headaches, and reduce stuffiness, however there is no expectorant in them. Mildly disappointing but oddly my sinuses did still drain at night, so the end result was the same.Overall, this medication worked great to relieve my sinus pain and worked great on a standard cold as well, plus it cost less. A win/win for me.
